title: McHugh pitches Astros to 5-2 win over Royals to open ALDS
text: McHugh pitches Astros to 5-2 win over Royals to open ALDS - KATV - Breaking News, Weather and Razorback Sports Member Center: EEO Public File Report McHugh pitches Astros to 5-2 win over Royals to open ALDS (AP Photo/Orlin Wagner). Houston Astros' George Springer celebrates after his solo home run during the fifth inning in Game 1 of baseball's American League Division Series against the Kansas City Royals, Thursday, Oct. 8, 2015, in Kansas City, Mo. (AP Photo/Charlie Riedel). Kansas City Royals' Kendrys Morales watches his solo home run during the fourth inning in Game 1 of baseball's American League Division Series against the Houston Astros, Thursday, Oct. 8, 2015, in Kansas City, Mo. (AP Photo/Charlie Riedel). Houston Astros' Jose Altuve, right, is tagged out by Kansas City Royals second baseman Ben Zobrist, left, while trying to steal second base during the fifth inning in Game 1 of baseball's American League Division Series, Thur... (AP Photo/Orlin Wagner). Kansas City Royals' Ben Zobrist, right, steals second base as Houston Astros second baseman Jose Altuve, left, leaps for the throw during the first inning in Game 1 of baseball's American League Division Series, Thursday, Oct. ... (AP Photo/Orlin Wagner). Jets fly over Kauffman Stadium before Game 1 of baseball's American League Division Series between the Kansas City Royals and the Houston Astros, Thursday, Oct. 8, 2015, in Kansas City, Mo.
